sentences.originalSentence: You can say all you want about the fogs in England, but I'm telling you, sure as I'm standing here, that our fogs here in the Bay of Fluck in Maine are way thicker.

sentences.originalSentence: My neighbor Dave is a fisherman, but he can't fish when it gets too foggy.
He always saves his chores for a foggy day.
